content:

thought: To craft fire_charge, I need blaze_powder. To craft blaze_powder, I need to break a blaze_rod. The only blaze_rod in my inventory is in slot 21, so I will move it to slot 1, which is in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To craft fire_charge, I need to place gunpowder, blaze_powder, and coal in the crafting grid. The closest of these items is blaze_powder, which is located at slot 13. Therefore, I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
